amendment.description: To allow the importation by individuals of safe and affordable drugs from Canada.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2107, under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 108.

action.text: Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S3536-3540, 23540, S3541-3542, S3543-3545, S3559-3561, S3562; text: CR S3536-3537) To allow the importation by individuals of safe and affordable drugs from Canada.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2107, under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 108.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2107, under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 108.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator McCain.
